metadata.dc:author: Díaz-Lobón, J M
Pérez-Piqueras, J
Gutiérrez, J A
Santa, J M
Sánchez, E
Madrona, C
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of chronic diarrhoea resulting in malabsorption syndrome in a patient with AIDS. Diarrhoea started two years before AIDS was diagnosed. The absence of risk factors may have delayed the diagnosis.
metadata.dc:title: El SIDA como causa insospechada de diarrea crónica y malabsorción.
[AIDS as non-suspected cause of chronic diarrhea and malabsorption].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
